readable.title: 3110614694_fecc23ca65
readable.content: A dog is running on snow with a snowball it its mouth . A dog running across the snow with a snowball in its mouth . A reddish brown dog runs across the snow with a snowball in its mouth . The beautiful reddish dog lopes around the flat snowy street with a snowball in its mouth . The brown dog runs on the snow with a white ball in his mouth .
